The expert: s verdict states that the claim made by the Senate Majority PAC is being fact-checked for authenticity.
The expert used OpenSecrets: org, a website run by the Center for Responsive Politics, to track and analyze campaign contributions received by Scott Brown.
The breakdown of contributions to Brown: s campaign was examined, revealing that he received $455,760 in campaign contributions from the oil and gas industry.
The expert also highlighted that the cat: big oil" includes both multinational and independent companies, as well as low-level individuals associated with the industry, indicating that not all contributions are directly from the companies themselves.
